Class EditorPanel

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, EditorComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandPanel, CreateSystemPanel
public class EditorPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements EditorComponent

This class is responsible for making the panel trimmings around an arbitrary editor component.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:

Constructor Detail

EditorPanel

public EditorPanel(EditorComponent editorComponent,
                   JFrame frame)
Construct an EditorPanel to display the given EditorComponent. The frame, if specified, will be told to make this object its content pane.

Parameters:
editorComponent - non-null; the EditorComponent to display and interact with
frame - null-ok; the frame to add this panel to

the frame to show the editor
